text: On March 15, 2018, a , recently erected section of the FIUâ€“Sweetwater UniversityCity Bridge collapsed onto the Tamiami Trail (U.S. Route 41). The pedestrian bridge was located in front of the campus of Florida International University (FIU) in University Park, a suburb west of Miami, Florida, United States. The road beneath it had been opened to traffic. Several occupied vehicles were crushed underneath, and six deaths and nine injuries have been reported. ==References== Category:2018 disasters Category:2018 in Florida Category:2010s in Miami Category:March 2018 events Category:Transport disasters in the United States
title: Florida International University pedestrian bridge collapse
